Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 161st overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2004...
Injured on 8/24/2006 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/30/2007 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2008, off Ryan Franklin (STL)...
Earned first career win on 5/25/2008...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/2008, off Josh Fogg (MIL)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2011, going 4-0, 1.31...
Injured on 5/15/2013 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2014, going 3-0, 1.09...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 4/18/2015...
Injured on 6/24/2015 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 4/22/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 4/12/2019 (Going to CIN: P W. Chen, P S. Teeters, LF A. Sanchez. Going to DET: P B. Wright, LF R. Deschamps)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
